timeline.message:
Bump ES version to 7.8.0

This PR bumps the ES version to 7.8.0. To fix various compile errors after the upgrade, I did the following:
First, rename various ES functions. For example, getAliasAndIndexLookup is renamed to getIndicesLookup.
Second, the license header check failed. I add an AL license in the licenseHeaders task.
Third, I removed all metadata related classes as we are not using them.

Testing done:
* gradle build pass. Will do more testing when we have the docker image.

timeline.bodyText: question. what happens to deletedetector? is it replaced with something new?
timeline.author: wnbts
timeline.diffHunk:

                 new ActionHandler<>(DeleteModelAction.INSTANCE, DeleteModelTransportAction.class),
-                new ActionHandler<>(DeleteDetectorAction.INSTANCE, DeleteDetectorTransportAction.class),

replies.bodyText: We have stopdetector, it is almost the same with deletedetector, except we don't delete anomaly result (I am working on retention period).
replies.author: kaituo
